definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_tamed</field><next><block type="entity_nbt_text_set"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Sitting</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">1</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_close_gui"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">So be it, I will rest here until you return comrade.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_getowner"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
